thread.title: Australia flanker Michael Hooper cited for alleged foul play during England win
thread.title_full: Australia flanker Michael Hooper cited for alleged foul play during England win

title: Australia flanker Michael Hooper cited for alleged foul play during England win
text:
Australia flanker Michael Hooper cited for alleged foul play during England win 05 Oct 2015 09:46:56 
comments 
Australia flanker Michael Hooper has been cited for alleged foul play during the Wallabies' 33-13 victory over England at Twickenham on Saturday. 
World Rugby announced that Hooper has been reported by independent citing commissioner Steve Hinds for allegedly "charging into a ruck or maul without use of the arms or grasping the player". 
Hooper will now face a disciplinary hearing in London on Tuesday. Related Sport News
